name: Garden/Planting CRUD
description: Implement the garden plot and plant management system with planting calendar functionality

turns.prompt: Create the Garden module for HomesteadHub. Build API routes for GardenPlots (/api/garden/plots) and Plants (/api/garden/plants) with full CRUD. Plants should be linked to plots. Include endpoints to get all plants in a specific plot and to bulk-update plant statuses (e.g., mark multiple as harvested).
turns.expectedBehavior: Creates API routes for both entities with proper relations, includes /api/garden/plots/[id]/plants endpoint, bulk update endpoint with transaction

turns.prompt: Build the garden overview page at /garden showing a visual grid of all plots. Each plot should be a card showing: plot name, size, number of plants, and a mini status bar (green for healthy, yellow for needs attention, red for problems). Clicking a plot opens a detail view with all plants in that plot.
turns.expectedBehavior: Creates src/app/garden/page.tsx with responsive card grid, status aggregation logic, src/app/garden/[plotId]/page.tsx for detail view with plant list

turns.prompt: Create a planting calendar component that shows a 12-month view. For each month, display which plants should be: started indoors (blue), transplanted (green), direct sown (brown), and harvested (gold). Base this on the expectedHarvest and plantedDate fields plus typical growing cycles. Allow clicking a month to see detailed planting tasks.
turns.expectedBehavior: Creates src/components/PlantingCalendar.tsx with 12-month grid, color-coded plant activities, uses plant data to calculate planting windows, modal or page for monthly detail

turns.prompt: Add plant tracking forms: create new plant (with species autocomplete from common vegetables), update growth stage (seed, seedling, vegetative, flowering, fruiting, harvest-ready), log notes with dates, and record actual harvest amount. Include a plant health log for tracking issues.
turns.expectedBehavior: Creates forms with autocomplete, growth stage enum, notes system with timestamps, harvest logging, health issue tracker with common problems dropdown

taskCompleted.description: Complete garden system with plots, plants, calendar, and detailed tracking
taskCompleted.validation: API routes work, visual grid displays, calendar calculates correctly, all forms functional

contextRetained.description: Plants link to plots from schema, calendar uses dates from plant records, consistent UI
contextRetained.validation: Relations match Prisma schema from 4.2, styling matches inventory module

codeWorks.description: Calendar calculations are accurate, status aggregation works correctly
codeWorks.validation: TypeScript compiles, date logic handles edge cases
